Package controller

Class AppointmentMenuController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AppointmentMenuController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class AppointmentMenuController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class adds and controls all the functionality of the Appointments Menu.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addAppointmentDataToBoxes()
      This method retrieves the data of a selected appointment and populates boxes matches the Contact ID with the Contact Name and is displayed in the ComboBox
      void addAppointmentDataToTables()
      The method is used to add the data to the Appointment Tables in the different tabs.
      void appointmentNotification()
      Checks for appointments within the next 15 minutes Will generate a pop-up message to alert the user of any upcoming appointments within the next 15 minutes or or if there is an ongoing appointment or no appointments
      void clearData()
      Resets text fields and comboboxes after performing a Save or an Update.
      void goToCustomerRB​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Switches the scene to the Customer Menu
      void goToReportsRB​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Switches the scene to the Reports Menu
      void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method initializes the AppointmentMenuController and populates the Appointment Table View.

      • appointmentNotification

        public void appointmentNotification()
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Checks for appointments within the next 15 minutes Will generate a pop-up message to alert the user of any upcoming appointments within the next 15 minutes or or if there is an ongoing appointment or no appointments
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if exception has occurred

      • addAppointmentDataToTables

        public void addAppointmentDataToTables()
                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        The method is used to add the data to the Appointment Tables in the different tabs. The data is retrieved from MySQL via the AppointmentsQuery class
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if exception has occurred

      • addAppointmentDataToBoxes

        public void addAppointmentDataToBoxes()
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method retrieves the data of a selected appointment and populates boxes matches the Contact ID with the Contact Name and is displayed in the ComboBox
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if exception has occurred

        public void clearData()
        Resets text fields and comboboxes after performing a Save or an Update.

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        This method initializes the AppointmentMenuController and populates the Appointment Table View.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        url - The url is used to find the relative paths for the root object.
        resourceBundle - The resource bundle is used to localize the root object.
